name: BackgroundMusic - Start Show
description: Starts a show with background music integration (fade out, brightness transition). Uses configured ShowPlaylist if no argument provided.

args.name: playlistName
args.description: Name of playlist/sequence to start (optional - uses configured ShowPlaylist if omitted)

name: BackgroundMusic - Start Main Show
description: Triggers the main show transition (stops background music, fades out, starts show playlist)

name: BackgroundMusic - Start Background Music
description: Starts the background music player (plays music playlist over existing sequence)

name: BackgroundMusic - Stop Background Music
description: Stops the background music player (sequences continue running)

name: BackgroundMusic - Play PSA
description: Plays a configured PSA announcement button (1-20) with audio ducking
